availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jonathon Todd (Hopkins County, Ky, farmer and day laborer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and day laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Quentina Todd. Father of Rutha J. Todd, Nancy A. Todd, Benjamin F. Todd, Mary J. Todd, Martha Todd, George C. Todd, Calvin Toff, John Todd, and Margaret Todd. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Day laborer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 139A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 654.
